products_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: R | PRE TREATMENT CHEMICAL (PTC) > R1 | HYDRANT SYSTEM
products_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection, fabrication, testing of MS black steel pipe Heavy grade of thickness 5.4mm conforming to IS : 1239 Part -1 including all fittings viz. Elbows, tees, flanges, etc. reduces clamps, MS support dash fasteners etc. including painting the pipe with two coats of approved primer and two coats of approved  paint. Pipe joints shall be grooved with groove coupling. All related civil work, supports etc shall be of vendor's scope. 150 mm NB
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: material: ms(black steel), grade: heavy, thickness: 5.4mm, standard: indian standard 1239 part -1, fittings: elbows, tees, flanges, reduces clamps, ms support dash fasteners, painting: two coats of approved primer and two coats of approved paint, joint: grooved with groove coupling, scope: all related civil work, supports etc of vendor's scope

products_entries.feature_or_specifications: material: cs(carbon steel), flanges: companion, accessories: nuts & bolts, gaskets

products_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: R | PRE TREATMENT CHEMICAL (PTC) > R1 | HYDRANT SYSTEM
products_entries.full_product_description: Supply & installation of SS oblique type single headed Landing valve with 80 mm inlet and 63 mm outlet SS instantaneous male coupling with rubber cap and chain conforming to IS : 5290 including matching flanges, gasket, nuts and bolts complete.
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: material: ss(stainless steel), type: oblique, head: single, coupling: ss instantaneous male, accessories: rubber cap and chain, standard: indian standard 5290, flanges: matching, accessories: gasket, nuts and bolts

products_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: R | PRE TREATMENT CHEMICAL (PTC) > R1 | HYDRANT SYSTEM
products_entries.full_product_description: Supply,Installation of Butterfly valve as per BS :5155 (Wafer type) matching flanges complete with nuts & bolts.. Necessary fittings shall be provided by erection vendor. Size 80 mm NB
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: standard: british standard 5155, type: wafer, flanges: matching, accessories: nuts & bolts, fittings: necessary fittings by erection vendor

products_entries.full_product_description: Supply & installation of SS branch pipe with 20 mm nozzle conforming to IS : 903 complete
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: material: ss(stainless steel), standard: indian standard 903

products_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: R | PRE TREATMENT CHEMICAL (PTC) > R1 | HYDRANT SYSTEM
products_entries.full_product_description: Supply & installation of 63 mm dia rubberized reinforced rubber line hose pipe in 15 m length conforming to IS : 636 Type II ISI marked with gunmetal male and female instantaneous coupling conforming to IS 903 wounded with 18 SWG copper wire complete
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: material: rubberized reinforced rubber, standard: indian standard 636 type ii, certification: isi, coupling: gunmetal male and female instantaneous, coupling standard: indian standard 903, wire: 18 swg copper

products_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: R | PRE TREATMENT CHEMICAL (PTC) > R1 | HYDRANT SYSTEM
products_entries.full_product_description: Supply & installation of MS Hose Box of fabricated from 16 SWG CRCA sheet double door with lockable arrangements to accommodate 2 RRL hose of 15 m length and one branch pipe painted white inside and red outside with one key. (750X600X250 mm)
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: material: ms(mild steel), fabrication: 16 swg crca sheet, doors: double, lockable: yes, capacity: 2 rrl hose of 15 m length and one branch pipe, paint: white inside and red outside, accessories: one key

products_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: R | PRE TREATMENT CHEMICAL (PTC) > R1 | HYDRANT SYSTEM
products_entries.full_product_description: Supply & installation of swinging type hose reel drum fabricated from 14 SWG CRCA sheets painted with red colour stove paint 2 coats over 1 coat of primer with 30 m long 20 mm dia rubber hose pipe with with SS self closing shut â€“ off nozzle of 5 mm outlet fixed on wall.
products_entries.size: hose length: 30 m, hose diameter: 20 mm, nozzle outlet: 5 mm
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: type: swinging, fabrication: 14 swg crca sheets, paint: red colour stove paint 2 coats over 1 coat of primer, hose: rubber, nozzle: ss(self closing shut-off), mounting: fixed on wall

products_entries.full_product_description: Supply and installation of pressure gauge, 1/2 inch bottom entry, of suitable range with ball valves and other accessories.
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: range: suitable, accessories: ball valves and other accessories

products_entries.feature_or_specifications: material: bronze, standard: indian standard 778, end-type: screwed

products_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: R | PRE TREATMENT CHEMICAL (PTC) > R1 | HYDRANT SYSTEM
products_entries.full_product_description: Supply & installation of 250ltr foam tank filled with 3% AFFF foam concentrate with foam making branch and pick up tube.

products_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: R | PRE TREATMENT CHEMICAL (PTC) > R2 | FOAM WATER SPRAY SYSTEM
products_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection , testing & commissioning of Deluge valve with dry pilot trim assembly,fitted with strainer, drain valve, pressure gauge, Pressure Switch, flame proof 3/2 way Solenoid Valve, air filter regulator etc. & manual release unit. The valve shall be electro-pneumatic double inter lock system as per scheme drawing. 150 mm NB
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: feature: dry pilot trim assembly, feature: fitted with strainer, feature: fitted with drain valve, feature: fitted with pressure gauge, feature: fitted with pressure switch, feature: fitted with flame proof 3/2 way solenoid valve, feature: fitted with air filter regulator, feature: manual release unit, feature: electro-pneumatic double inter lock system as per scheme drawing

products_entries.full_product_description: Supply, installation, testing of Y- Strainer. Size 150 mm NB

products_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: R | PRE TREATMENT CHEMICAL (PTC) > R2 | FOAM WATER SPRAY SYSTEM
products_entries.full_product_description: Supply,installation,testing and commissioning of Foam Sprinkler nozzle with necessary threaded fittings as per drawing. The sprinkler shall be Open Aspiration, Pendent type, K-42 with standard spray angle.End connection 1/2" NPT/BSP.UL/FM Approved. Spray nozzle K factor -42
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: feature: open aspiration, type: pendent, spray angle: standard, end connection: 1/2" NPT/BSP, certification: UL(underwriters laboratories), certification: FM(factory mutual), feature: necessary threaded fittings as per drawing

products_entries.feature_or_specifications: certification: UL(underwriters laboratories), certification: FM(factory mutual), temperature rating: 68 deg C

products_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: R | PRE TREATMENT CHEMICAL (PTC) > R2 | FOAM WATER SPRAY SYSTEM
products_entries.full_product_description: Supply, installation, testing and commissioning of Ratio Controller. 150NB

products_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: R | PRE TREATMENT CHEMICAL (PTC) > R2 | FOAM WATER SPRAY SYSTEM
products_entries.full_product_description: Supply, installation, testing and commissioning of Foam bladder tank vertical type ,manufacturing as per ASME, section-VIII part- I. The bladder material shall be BUNA-N. The Bladder Tank shall be supplied along with all necessary valves, Hydraulically Operated Foam Concentrae Control Valve ,fittingss & instruments as per Technical data sheet attached with Tender documents. Capacity of 2100 ltr.
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: type: vertical, standard: ASME section-VIII part-I, bladder material: BUNA-N, feature: supplied along with all necessary valves, feature: hydraulically operated foam concentrate control valve, feature: fittings & instruments as per technical data sheet attached with tender documents

products_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: R | PRE TREATMENT CHEMICAL (PTC) > R2 | FOAM WATER SPRAY SYSTEM
products_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection, testing and commissioning of GI "C" Class(Heavy Class)  pipes conforming to IS 1239 with threaded or grooved fittings with  including cutting  pipes to correct lengths, providing fittings like elbow,tee,reducer and welding flanges to pipe, fixing with clamps to MS brackets / hangers, steel supports as per drawing.  Rate shall be inclusive of Zinc chromate primer over that 2 coats red enamel paint as per Fire authorities requirement over all above ground pies. Rates to be inclusive of  all complete as per specifications; 150 NB
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: class: C (Heavy Class), standard: indian standard 1239, fitting-type: threaded or grooved, fittings-included: elbow, tee, reducer, welding flanges, fixing: clamps to MS brackets/hangers, steel supports, primer: zinc chromate, paint: 2 coats red enamel, application: above ground pipes, feature: as per fire authorities requirement
